Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.GuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEventListener, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, GameEventListener
JavaFX controller coordinating UI initialization, input handling, rendering, overlays, and bindings with the core game logic.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Eashwar
